```{r}
#Load libraries 

library(lterdatasampler)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#| fig-cap: "fiddler crab sizes"
pie_crab <- pie_crab

ggplot(data = pie_crab, 
       aes(x = size, 
           y = latitude)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  coord_flip() 
```
```{r}
#Summary table 

library(dplyr)

pie_crab |> 
  group_by(site) |>
  summarize(mean_size = round(mean(size, na.rm = TRUE),2), 
            sd_size = sd(size, na.rm = TRUE),
            sample_size = n())

```
